rukus.text: 20|105|Va [ej pajomʙar] az tu dar ʙorai kuhho [dar qijomat] mepursand; pas, ʙigu: «Parvardigoram ononro saxt mutalosi [va parokanda] mekunad
20|107|[Hamcun zamine] Ki dar on hec pasti va ʙalandi nameʙini»
20|108|Dar on ruz [hamai mardum] ʙiduni hec muxolifate az da'vatkunanda [-i ilohi] pajravi mekunand va sadoho dar ʙaroʙari Xudoi mehruʙon past mesavand va az hec ciz cuz sadoi poje naxohi sunid
20|109|Dar on ruz safoat sud nadihad, magar onro, ki Xudoi Rahmon ʙa u icozat dihad va suxanasro ʙipisandad
20|110|[Alloh taolo] On ciro, ki insonho [dar oxirat] dar pes dorand va on ciro, ki [dar dunjo] pusti sar guzostaand, [hamaro] medonad, vale donisi onon uro faro namegirad
20|111|Va cehraho dar ʙaroʙari [Parvardigori] zindai pojdor xor megardad va har ki [ʙori] sitam ʙardost, zijon did
20|112|Va kase, ki az korhoi soista ancom dihad va mu'min ʙosad, na az hec sitame meharosad va na az kostan [-i podosas]
20|113|Va, incunin, onro Qur'one [ʙa zaʙoni] araʙi nozil kardem va husdorhoi gunogun dar on ʙajon namudem; ʙosad, ki [az azoʙi ilohi] parhezand jo [in kitoʙ] ʙarojason pande padid ovarad
20|114|Pas, ʙalandmartaʙa ast Alloh taolo, ki farmonravoi haq ast. Va dar [xondani] Qur'on – pes az on ki vahji on ʙar tu pojon joʙad – sitoʙ makun; va ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, ʙar donisam ʙijafzo»
20|115|Ba rosti, pes az in ʙo Odam pajmon ʙastem [ki az mevai daraxti mamnua naxurad]; vale [pajmonasro] faromus kard va dar u azme [ustuvor] najoftem
